mapper.select: select no, userid, subject, hit, to_char(writedate, 'MM-DD HH:MI') as writedate from board order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(no, userid, subject, content, ip) values(boardsq.nextval, #{userid}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{ip})
mapper.update: update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where no=#{no} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from board where no=#{param1} and userid=#{param2}
